channel.title: mysql on Adnan Ahmed
channel.description: Recent content in mysql on Adnan Ahmed

item.title: MySQL Order By Value
item.description: Today I ran into a problem. I need to sort results of a given query by column values. I have a column named priority with values 'Low', 'Normal', 'High'. When I used normal sort method like Order By priority ASC it returned 'High', 'Low', 'Normal' and by using Order By status DESC it returned 'Normal', 'Low', 'High' But i want result in this order 'High', 'Normal', 'Low'. So after searching i came up with a solution.
